siteMetadata.title: Nicolas Bontempo
siteMetadata.subtitle: Experimental ground to develop my own ideas and share them with others

frontmatter.title: Processing Pipelines (Dataflow) - Introduction
frontmatter.description: Hello Guys, recently I changed a job going to a new challenge into Take. From this, I started to study some parts of the stack that I was not familiar. One of these parts was Dataflow. This is the start of my summary mostly provided by the study of the documentation and some coding.
